name: Awakened  Tee
description:
Printed on cotton shirts, currently only available in black t-shirts! Pre-order now, before we send out for the shirts so we get your sizes and everything. If not, we may not have your size when and if you do want to buy later on.

Awakened Buddha with the all seeing eye. Shirt is $15.00 + $2.00 Shipping! 

(If you live nearby us [Queens, New York] and you don't want to be charged for shipping, and want to pickup, contact us on myspace.)

http://www.myspace.com/saveusfromthezombies
